ichor.core.daemon package

Submodules

ichor.core.daemon.daemon module

Used to run ICHOR as a deamon, where it is detached from terminal.

class Daemon(pidfile: Path, stdin: Path = PosixPath('/dev/null'), stdout: Path = PosixPath('/dev/null'), stderr: Path = PosixPath('/dev/null'), pid_store: Path | None = None)

Bases: ABC

A generic daemon class.

Usage: subclass the Daemon class and override the run() method

Credit: Sander Marechal (https://bit.ly/3frF5RK)

check() → bool
daemonize()

do the UNIX double-fork magic, see Stevens’ “Advanced Programming in the UNIX Environment” for details (ISBN 0201563177) http://www.erlenstar.demon.co.uk/unix/faq_2.html#SEC16

delpid()
restart()

Restart the daemon

abstract run()
start()

Start the daemon

stop()

Stop the daemon

exception DaemonRunning

Bases: Exception
